title: My Sister Wants an Elephant
description: Randy’s sister wants a WHAT?!? And his Mom isn’t flat-out saying no?!My Sister Wants an Elephant is the true story of two siblings who team up together to convince their mother to let them own a couple of wild animals as pets, and a mother who just might be persuaded.Full of humor and fun, this book is a good lesson in not giving up on your dreams, no matter how truly wild they may be!
author: Lynne Podrat
